name: Kitty & Bun: Picnic Planners
description:
a short and sweet adventure! 

made for the great autumn game jam 2021

here it is!! my first game! it's not very big or fancy, but it looks cute and cozy, so it's good enough for me <3

i'm hoping to turn kittybun into a series! look forward to more adventures involving these two in the future~

that's all from me! happy fall!

~luluco (oddhibiki)
